line.words: Le Café de la nourriture folle.

subtitle.line: The Crazy Food Café.
The Crazy Food Café.
The Crazy Food Café.
Café Skør Mad.
The Crazy Food Café.

line.words: “J’ai faim,” dit Jimmy. “Faim de quoi?§ dit la mère de Jimmy. Elle regarde sa montre. §De nourriture bien sûr !§ dit Jimmy. §Et j’ai soif aussi.§

subtitle.line: §I’m hungry,§ says Jimmy. ‘What for?§ says Jimmy’s Mum. She looks at her watch. §Food, of course,§ says Jimmy. §And I’m thirsty too.§ §Oh, ok then,§ says Jimmy’s Mum, §but let’s not go crazy, eh. Just one drink - a cola, or lemonade, or an orange juice. And a biscuit. Something like that.§

§I’m hungry,§ says Jimmy. ‘What for?§ says Jimmy’s Mum. She looks at her watch. §Food, of course,§ says Jimmy. §And I’m thirsty too.§ §Oh, ok then,§ says Jimmy’s Mum, §but let’s not go crazy, eh. Just one drink - a cola, or lemonade, or an orange juice. And a biscuit. Something like that.§

§I’m hungry,§ says Jimmy. ‘What for?§ says Jimmy’s Mum. She looks at her watch. §Food, of course,§ says Jimmy. §And I’m thirsty too.§ §Oh, ok then,§ says Jimmy’s Mum, §but let’s not go crazy, eh. Just one drink - a cola, or lemonade, or an orange juice. And a biscuit. Something like that.§
“Jeg er sulten”, siger Jimmy. ”Efter hvad?” siger Jimmys mor. Hun kigger på uret. ”Mad selvfølgelig”, siger Jim. ”Og jeg er også tørstig”.

§I’m hungry,§ says Jimmy. ‘What for?§ says Jimmy’s Mum. She looks at her watch. §Food, of course,§ says Jimmy. §And I’m thirsty too.§ §Oh, ok then,§ says Jimmy’s Mum, §but let’s not go crazy, eh. Just one drink - a cola, or lemonade, or an orange juice. And a biscuit. Something like that.§

line.words: §Oh, d’accord alors,§ dit la mère de Jimmy, §mais ne soyons pas fou hein? Juste une boisson - un coca, une limonade ou un jus d’orange. Et un biscuit. Quelque chose comme ça.§

subtitle.line: §Oh, ok then,§ says Jimmy’s Mum, §but let’s not go crazy, eh. Just one drink - a cola, or lemonade, or an orange juice. And a biscuit. Something like that.§
§Oh, ok then,§ says Jimmy’s Mum, §but let’s not go crazy, eh. Just one drink - a cola, or lemonade, or an orange juice. And a biscuit. Something like that.§
§Oh, ok then,§ says Jimmy’s Mum, §but let’s not go crazy, eh. Just one drink - a cola, or lemonade, or an orange juice. And a biscuit. Something like that.§
”Nå, ok”, siger Jimmys mor, ”men nu skal vi jo ikke gå helt amok, vel. Kun en ting at drikke – cola, lemonade eller appelsinjuice. Og en kiks. Noget i den retning.”
§Oh, ok then,§ says Jimmy’s Mum, §but let’s not go crazy, eh. Just one drink - a cola, or lemonade, or an orange juice. And a biscuit. Something like that.§

line.words: Jimmy et sa mère s’assoient à l’extérieur du ‘Café de la nourriture folle.’ Ils regardent le menu.

subtitle.line: Jimmy and his Mum sit outside 'The Crazy Food Café.' They look at the menu.
Jimmy and his Mum sit outside 'The Crazy Food Café.' They look at the menu.
Jimmy and his Mum sit outside 'The Crazy Food Café.' They look at the menu.
Jimmy og hans mor sidder uden for Café Skør Mad”. De kigger på menukortet.
Jimmy and his Mum sit outside 'The Crazy Food Café.' They look at the menu.

line.words: Un serveur s’approche. Sa veste est couverte de morceaux de nourriture et de traces de boissons.

subtitle.line: A waiter comes over. His jacket is covered in bits of food and drink:
A waiter comes over. His jacket is covered in bits of food and drink:
A waiter comes over. His jacket is covered in bits of food and drink:
Der kommer en tjener over til dem. Hans jakke er fyldt med rester af mad og drikkevarer:
A waiter comes over. His jacket is covered in bits of food and drink:

line.words: §Café, chocolat chaud, moules, thé au lait et toutes les sortes de crèmes glacées auxquelles vous pouvez penser.§ Il sourit et Jimmy lui sourit à son tour. Jimmy aime bien ce serveur.

subtitle.line: ‘Coffee, hot chocolate, mussels, milk tea and every kind of ice cream you can think of.’ He grins at Jimmy and Jimmy grins back. Jimmy likes this waiter.
‘Coffee, hot chocolate, mussels, milk tea and every kind of ice cream you can think of.’ He grins at Jimmy and Jimmy grins back. Jimmy likes this waiter.
‘Coffee, hot chocolate, mussels, milk tea and every kind of ice cream you can think of.’ He grins at Jimmy and Jimmy grins back. Jimmy likes this waiter.
”Kaffe, varm chokolade, muslinger, te med mælk og alle slags is.” Han griner til Jimmy. Jimmy griner tilbage. Jimmy kan godt lide den tjener.
‘Coffee, hot chocolate, mussels, milk tea and every kind of ice cream you can think of.’ He grins at Jimmy and Jimmy grins back. Jimmy likes this waiter.

line.words: “Puis-je avoir un mélange de toutes les boissons délicieuses? Et un mélange de toutes les glaces?§ demanda Jimmy. §Jimmy!§ s’exclama sa mère.

subtitle.line: §Can I have a mix of every delicious drink? And a mix of every ice cream?§ says Jimmy. §Jimmy!§ says Jimmy’s Mum.
§Can I have a mix of every delicious drink? And a mix of every ice cream?§ says Jimmy. §Jimmy!§ says Jimmy’s Mum.
§Can I have a mix of every delicious drink? And a mix of every ice cream?§ says Jimmy. §Jimmy!§ says Jimmy’s Mum.
“Kan jeg få en blanding af alle de dejlige drikkevarer? Og en blanding af alle isene?” siger Jimmy. ”Jimmy!” siger Jimmys mor.
§Can I have a mix of every delicious drink? And a mix of every ice cream?§ says Jimmy. §Jimmy!§ says Jimmy’s Mum.

line.words: Le serveur sourit, prend son crayon et son carnet et commence à écrire : §Comme boisson : un verre de jus de pomme, d’orange, de coca, de limonade, d’eau minérale et milkshake.§

subtitle.line: The waiter grins, takes out a pencil and paper and begins to write: §To drink: a glass of apple, orange, cola, lemonade, mineral water and milkshake.§
The waiter grins, takes out a pencil and paper and begins to write: §To drink: a glass of apple, orange, cola, lemonade, mineral water and milkshake.§
The waiter grins, takes out a pencil and paper and begins to write: §To drink: a glass of apple, orange, cola, lemonade, mineral water and milkshake.§
Tjeneren griner, tager blyant og papir frem og begynder at skrive: ”Drikkevarer: Et glas æble, appelsin, cola, lemonade, mineralvand og milkshake.”
The waiter grins, takes out a pencil and paper and begins to write: §To drink: a glass of apple, orange, cola, lemonade, mineral water and milkshake.§

line.words: §Pas d’eau minérale,§ dit Jimmy §Pas d’eau minérale,§ écrit le serveur.

subtitle.line: §No mineral water,§ says Jimmy. §No mineral water,§ writes the waiter.
§No mineral water,§ says Jimmy. §No mineral water,§ writes the waiter.
§No mineral water,§ says Jimmy. §No mineral water,§ writes the waiter.
”Ingen mineralvand”, siger Jimmy. ”Ingen mineralvand”, skriver tjeneren.
§No mineral water,§ says Jimmy. §No mineral water,§ writes the waiter.

line.words: “Et pour manger,§ dit le serveur en mordillant le bout de son crayon. §Une boule de glace au citron, caramel, framboise, pistache, menthe, abricot, chocolat, cassis et vanille. § §Et fraise,§ dit Jimmy.

subtitle.line: §And to eat,§ says the waiter chewing the end of his pencil. §A scoop of lemon, caramel, raspberry, pistachio, mint, apricot, chocolate, blackcurrant, vanilla ice cream.§ §And strawberry,§ says Jimmy.

§And to eat,§ says the waiter chewing the end of his pencil. §A scoop of lemon, caramel, raspberry, pistachio, mint, apricot, chocolate, blackcurrant, vanilla ice cream.§ §And strawberry,§ says Jimmy.

§And to eat,§ says the waiter chewing the end of his pencil. §A scoop of lemon, caramel, raspberry, pistachio, mint, apricot, chocolate, blackcurrant, vanilla ice cream.§ §And strawberry,§ says Jimmy.
“Og mad”, siger tjeneren og sutter på blyanten. ”En skefuld citron, karamel, pistacie, pebermynte, abrikos, chokolade, solbær, vaniljeis.” ”Og jordbær”, siger Jimmy.

§And to eat,§ says the waiter chewing the end of his pencil. §A scoop of lemon, caramel, raspberry, pistachio, mint, apricot, chocolate, blackcurrant, vanilla ice cream.§ §And strawberry,§ says Jimmy.

line.words: §Jimmy!§ dit sa mère. §Et fraise,§ sourit le serveur.

subtitle.line: §Jimmy!§ says Jimmy’s Mum. §And strawberry,§ grins the waiter.
§Jimmy!§ says Jimmy’s Mum. §And strawberry,§ grins the waiter.
§Jimmy!§ says Jimmy’s Mum. §And strawberry,§ grins the waiter.
”Jimmy!” siger Jimmys mor. “Og jordbær”, griner tjeneren.”
§Jimmy!§ says Jimmy’s Mum. §And strawberry,§ grins the waiter.

line.words: La mère de Jimmy commande un sandwich au fromage de chèvre chaud, une salade, des frites et un verre d’eau. §Autre chose ?§ dit le serveur.

subtitle.line: Jimmy’s Mum orders a toasted cheese sandwich, a salad, chips and a glass of water. §Anything else?§ says the waiter.
Jimmy’s Mum orders a toasted cheese sandwich, a salad, chips and a glass of water. §Anything else?§ says the waiter.
Jimmy’s Mum orders a toasted cheese sandwich, a salad, chips and a glass of water. §Anything else?§ says the waiter.
Jimmys mor bestiller ostesandwich, salat, pommes fritter og et glas vand. ”Ellers andet”, siger tjeneren.
Jimmy’s Mum orders a toasted cheese sandwich, a salad, chips and a glass of water. §Anything else?§ says the waiter.

line.words: Il sourit et la mère de Jimmy lui sourit à son tour. La mère de Jimmy aime bien ce serveur. §Et un café au fromage, un sachet de caramels durs, du sucre et un litre de glace à la frite.§ §Combien de sucres ?§ demande le serveur.

subtitle.line: He grins at Jimmy’s Mum. Jimmy’s Mum grins back. Jimmy’s Mum likes this waiter. §And a cheese coffee, a packet of toffee, sugar and a litre of crisps ice cream.§ §How much sugar?§ says the waiter.
He grins at Jimmy’s Mum. Jimmy’s Mum grins back. Jimmy’s Mum likes this waiter. §And a cheese coffee, a packet of toffee, sugar and a litre of crisps ice cream.§ §How much sugar?§ says the waiter.
He grins at Jimmy’s Mum. Jimmy’s Mum grins back. Jimmy’s Mum likes this waiter. §And a cheese coffee, a packet of toffee, sugar and a litre of crisps ice cream.§ §How much sugar?§ says the waiter.

Han griner til Jimmys mor. Jimmys mor griner tilbage. Jimmys mor kan godt lide den tjener. ”Og en ostekaffe, en pakke karameller, sukker og en liter is med chips.” ”Hvor meget sukker”? Siger tjeneren.
He grins at Jimmy’s Mum. Jimmy’s Mum grins back. Jimmy’s Mum likes this waiter. §And a cheese coffee, a packet of toffee, sugar and a litre of crisps ice cream.§ §How much sugar?§ says the waiter.

line.words: §Juste un petit peu,§ répond la mère.

subtitle.line: §Just a pinch,§ say Mum.
§Just a pinch,§ say Mum.
§Just a pinch,§ say Mum.
”Bare ganske lidt”, siger mor.
§Just a pinch,§ say Mum.

line.words: “Maman!” Les yeux de Jimmy sont aussi gros et ronds que deux grosses billes. §Quoi?§ sourit sa mère §Oui, quoi?§ dit le serveur en apportant la commande de Jimmy et de sa mère.

subtitle.line: ‘Mum!’ Jimmy’s eyes are as large and as round as two large, round marbles. ‘What?’ grins Jimmy’s Mum. §Yes, what?§ says the waiter, bringing Jimmy and Jimmy’s Mum’s food over to the table.
‘Mum!’ Jimmy’s eyes are as large and as round as two large, round marbles. ‘What?’ grins Jimmy’s Mum. §Yes, what?§ says the waiter, bringing Jimmy and Jimmy’s Mum’s food over to the table.
‘Mum!’ Jimmy’s eyes are as large and as round as two large, round marbles. ‘What?’ grins Jimmy’s Mum. §Yes, what?§ says the waiter, bringing Jimmy and Jimmy’s Mum’s food over to the table.
“Mor!” Jimmys øjne er så store og runde som to store, runde marmorkugler. ”Hvad er der?” griner Jimmys mor. ”Ja, hvad?” siger tjeneren og kommer over til bordet med deres mad.
‘Mum!’ Jimmy’s eyes are as large and as round as two large, round marbles. ‘What?’ grins Jimmy’s Mum. §Yes, what?§ says the waiter, bringing Jimmy and Jimmy’s Mum’s food over to the table.

line.words: Jimmy mange tout ce qu’il a commandé.

subtitle.line: Jimmy eats everything that he ordered.
Jimmy eats everything that he ordered.
Jimmy eats everything that he ordered.
Jimmy spiser det hele.
Jimmy eats everything that he ordered.

line.words: La maman de Jimmy mange tout ce qu’elle a commandé.

subtitle.line: Jimmy’s Mum eats everything that she ordered.
Jimmy’s Mum eats everything that she ordered.
Jimmy’s Mum eats everything that she ordered.
Jimmys mor spiser det hele.
Jimmy’s Mum eats everything that she ordered.

line.words: Le serveur joue de la batterie avec une petite cuillère et une cuillère à soupe.

subtitle.line: The waiter plays a drum with a teaspoon and a soup spoon.
The waiter plays a drum with a teaspoon and a soup spoon.
The waiter plays a drum with a teaspoon and a soup spoon.
Tjeneren spiller tromme med en teske og en spiseske.
The waiter plays a drum with a teaspoon and a soup spoon.

line.words: Tous passent un merveilleux moment au ‘Café de la nourriture folle.’

subtitle.line: Everyone has the best time at The Crazy Food Café.
Everyone has the best time at The Crazy Food Café.
Everyone has the best time at The Crazy Food Café.
Alle har det sjovt på Café Skør Mad.
Everyone has the best time at The Crazy Food Café.
